name: Her Pantyhose
description:
This is a visual novel game of choice. The hero has a secret fetish and is obsessed with pantyhose worn by girls. Players need to play the role of the male protagonist, make different choices in the game, and experience different stories.

· This is a visual novel of choice.
· The player has to make choices based on the storyline.
Different choices develop into different storylines and endings.
· Beautiful 3D female character modeling.
· Beautiful and varied camera techniques.
· Rich and full of surprises.
